author: DistroTube
description:
LocalSend is a free, open-source app that allows you to securely share files and messages with nearby devices over your local network without needing an internet connection. LocalSend is available on Windows, Mac, Linux, Android and iOS.

REFERENCED:
► https://github.com/localsend/localsend
